Package org.projectsw.Distributed.Messages.InputMessages

Class InputMessage

java.lang.Object
org.projectsw.Distributed.Messages.InputMessages.InputMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmIReconnecting, AskForAllShelves, AskForBoard, AskForChat, AskForCommonGoals, AskForCurrentPlayer, AskForPersonalGoal, AskForResults, AskForShelf, AskForTemporaryTiles, ChatMessage, ConfirmColumnSelection, ConfirmNumberOfPlayers, ConfirmSelectedTiles, ConfirmTilePlacement, ConfirmTileSelection, Connect, DeleteModelObserver, EndTurn, EndTurnExit, LoadGameSelection, NotActive, SendNickname
public abstract class InputMessage extends Object implements Serializable
An abstract class representing an input message. Input messages are used to communicate input data between clients and the engine. They can be executed on the engine to perform specific actions.
See Also:
